1.speaker: POLAR BEAR
1.character: はい、しろくまカフェです
1.letter: Hello, this is Polar Bear's Café.

2.speaker: PANDA
2.character: あ　こんにちは　先日面接にいった、パンダですよ
2.letter: Oh, hello. This is Panda, who you interviewed the other day.

3.speaker: POLAR BEAR
3.letter: Oh, the one who didn't pass.

4.speaker: PANDA
4.character: 出前を お願いしたいんです
4.letter: I would like to place a delivery order.

5.speaker: POLAR BEAR
5.character: 出前はやってないですが
5.letter: I'm sorry, we don't do deliveries. Even though you're right next door?

6.speaker: POLAR BEAR
6.letter: Not to mention we're quite busy right now. Aww...

7.speaker: PANDA
7.character: どうすれば出前してくれるの？
7.letter: What would it take for you to make a delivery?

11.speaker: PANDA
11.letter: I was looking for a job. Come on, you're right next door, so make a delivery.

13.speaker: PANDA
13.character: あああ～～～～　吸わないで～～～
13.letter: Waah, please don't suck me up!

17.speaker: POLAR BEAR
17.character: ペンギンさん、何にする？
17.letter: What would you like, Mr. Penguin? Let's see...

20.speaker: SASAKO
20.character: えっ？！いつものやつって  言われたんですけど
20.letter: What?! He asked for... the usual.

21.speaker: POLAR BEAR
21.letter: Leave it to me. Here's your curry rice.

22.speaker: SASAKO
22.letter: Apparently that wasn't it. I knew it.

24.speaker: PANDA
24.character: あの、竹か笹はないんですか
24.letter: Excuse me, do you not have any bamboo or bamboo grass?

26.speaker: PANDA
26.letter: Then could I get an iced coffee?

27.speaker: POLAR BEAR
27.character: あ、君バイト探してたよね
27.letter: You were looking for a part-time job, weren't you?

30.speaker: FISHERMAN
30.character: 経験者大歓迎、激しく重労働
30.letter: We will gladly accept those with experience! Intense physical labor!

32.speaker: PANDA
32.letter: No way!  Not to mention, I can't swim!

33.speaker: PENGUIN
33.character: こっちのがいいじやない？
33.letter: I think this one is better.

34.speaker: ZOO KEEP
34.character: 動物園  未経験者歓迎
34.letter: The zoo is accepting applicants without experience.

35.speaker: ZOO KEEP
35.letter: We will gladly accommodate work days.

36.speaker: PANDA
36.character: 先ずはお電話ください　フリアイ動物園
36.letter: "Please give us a call. The Petting Zoo."

37.speaker: POLAR BEAR
37.letter: You should totally go with the tuna boat.

39.speaker: PANDA
39.character: 動物園か　面白そう
39.letter: The zoo, huh?  That sounds fun!

40.speaker: ZOO KEEP
40.character: えっと  週二日の勤務希望ですか？
40.letter: Let's see, so you're looking to work two days a week?

42.speaker: ZOO KEEP
42.character: では、パンダの仕事はどうでしょう？
42.letter: Then would you be interested in the position of "panda"? Huh?

43.speaker: ZOO KEEP
43.character: 常勤パンダさんが一頭いるですが

44.speaker: ZOO KEEP
44.character: 非常勤でもう一頭募集してるんです
44.letter: but we're also looking to fill a part-time slot.

45.speaker: PANDA
45.character: パンダって　あのパンダですよね
45.letter: When you say "panda," you do mean {\i1}that{\i0} panda, right?

47.speaker: ZOO KEEP
47.character: でしたら　月の輪熊とゴリラも募集していますよ
47.letter: In that case, we are looking for an Asian black bear and a gorilla.

49.speaker: ZOO KEEP
49.character: そうですか、では、来週から来てください
49.letter: I see.  Then please begin coming next week.

50.speaker: PANDA
50.letter: I found a part-time job. Really?  That's great to hear! The tuna boat?

51.speaker: PANDA
51.letter: No way.  The zoo. What part-time job are you going to be doing at the zoo? It's a secret.

53.speaker: PANDA
53.character: いよいよ今日からバイトか　ドキドキしちゃうなぁ
53.letter: Today's the day I start my part-time job. I'm so excited. Hello again, my name is Handa.

54.speaker: HANDA
54.character: 今日は幼稚園から園児たちが来ます
54.letter: We will have some preschool visitors today.

55.speaker: HANDA
55.character: 少しサービスしてあげてください
55.letter: Please give them a little extra service.

57.speaker: PANDA
57.character: サービスですね　分かりました

58.speaker: PANDA
58.character: それ以外の時間はどんな感じで？
58.letter: What should I be doing the rest of the time?

61.speaker: PENGUIN
61.character: パンダ君うまくやってるかなぁ～
61.letter: How do you think Panda's doing?

62.speaker: POLAR BEAR
62.character: きっと大漁だよ、まぐろ船
62.letter: I'm sure he'll get a huge haul on the tuna boat.

63.speaker: PENGUIN
63.letter: You're not letting go of that, are you? Oh, could I get a café mocha?

64.speaker: PENGUIN
64.character: って、それは  影武者、いいから、そういうの
64.letter: Um... That would be a body double {\i1}(kagemusha){\i0}. Honestly, you don't have to do that.

65.speaker: PANDA
65.letter: Really?  Seven days a week? You don't have a day off?

66.speaker: FTPANDA
66.character: あたしは常勤パンダですからね
66.letter: Well, I am a full-time panda.

67.speaker: FTPANDA
67.character: でも月に二日くらいは休みますよ
67.letter: But I do take about two days off a month.

68.speaker: PANDA
68.letter: I'm so glad I'm part-time. Well, it'll be a pleasure working with you.

73.speaker: HANDA
73.character: 自然態でって言われたんです
73.letter: ...naturally. is how I should act. I see.

74.speaker: PANDA
74.character: こんな感じでしょうか？自然と一体的な？
74.letter: Is it something like this? Does this look like I'm one with nature?

75.speaker: FTPANDA
75.character: 多分違うと思う　というか　すごく不自然
75.letter: I don't think that's what he meant. Or rather, that's very unnatural. Well, you don't have to worry so much. Just act like normal and you'll be fine. Oh...

77.speaker: TEACHER
77.character: はい　皆　パンダさんですよ

78.speaker: FTPANDA
78.character: あ　園児が来ましたね
78.letter: Oh, looks like the preschool kids are here.

79.speaker: FTPANDA
79.character: さ～　頑張りましょう
79.letter: Let's give it our best. O-Okay! Look, the pandas are eating!

81.speaker: KID-B
81.character: はは～パンダさんは滑り台滑ってるの
81.letter: Look, the pandas are playing on the slide! Yes, they are.

82.speaker: KID-C
82.character: パンダさんが転がってるよ
82.letter: Look, the pandas are rolling around!

84.speaker: PANDA
84.character: これでサービスになってるんですか？
84.letter: Is this what they consider service?

85.speaker: FTPANDA
85.character: もうちょっとの辛抱ですよ～
85.letter: It's just for a little while longer.

86.speaker: FTPANDA
86.character: あ～　もう一サービスしましょう
86.letter: All right, let's give it one more go!

89.speaker: TEACHER
89.character: 皆、次はキリンさんを見ましょう
89.letter: Okay, everyone.  Let's go see the giraffes next.

94.speaker: PANDA
94.letter: Service, service... I totally fell asleep.

95.speaker: PANDA
95.character: なんで起こしてくれないんですか、常勤パンダさん、え！
95.letter: Why didn't you wake me up, Mr. Full-Time Panda?

96.speaker: VOICE
96.character: 閉園の時間になりました　またのご来園をお待ちしております
96.letter: {\a6\i1}The zoo will now be closing. {\a6\i1}Please come again.

97.speaker: HANDA
97.letter: Thank you for all your hard work today.

101.speaker: SASAKO
101.character: お知り合いなんですか
101.letter: Do you all know each other?

102.speaker: LLAMA
102.character: 僕たちも動物園でバイトしてるんですよ
102.letter: We're working part-time at the zoo, as well.

103.speaker: KOALA
103.character: パンダ君　こっちこっち

104.speaker: KOALA
104.character: 今日は園児が可愛かったね
104.letter: The preschool kids were so cute today.

105.speaker: PANDA
105.character: 僕　張り切り過ぎでて  途中で  ばてちゃった
105.letter: I over-exerted myself and passed out.

106.speaker: LLAMA
106.character: わかります　わかります

107.speaker: PANDA
107.character: 今日は一日真面目に働いたなぁ

109.speaker: PENGUIN
109.character: すごいやりきった顔だけど　パンダ君途中からずっと寝てたらしいよ
109.letter: He looks so satisfied with himself,

110.speaker: PANDA
110.character: すごいやりきった顔だけど　パンダ君途中からずっと寝てたらしいよ
110.letter: {\a6}I feel so fulfilled. but apparently he slept half the time. {\a6}I know where you're coming from. I guess that's "acting naturally" to him.

111.speaker: PENGUIN
111.character: パンダ君って　割りと図々しいよね

112.speaker: LLAMA
112.character: パンダ君　一先何か頼みませんか？
112.letter: Why don't you order something, Panda?

114.speaker: POLAR BEAR
114.letter: What can I get for you?

116.speaker: PENGUIN
116.character: しろくま君　それは　守宮！

119.speaker: BOTH BEARS
119.character: 笹子さんが突っ込みを！

121.speaker: PANDA
121.letter: Hey, can I get my bamboo, already?

122.speaker: PANDA
122.character: ペンギンさんペンギンさん

123.speaker: PANDA
123.character: 僕が全部毛を剃ると　どうなってると思う？
123.letter: What do you think I'd look like if I shaved off all my hair? This isn't the time. We're supposed to be doing the preview.

124.speaker: PANDA
124.character: じゃ～さ　ペンギンさんのだめな部分三つ教えて
124.letter: Then could you tell me three bad traits about yourself?

125.speaker: PENGUIN
125.character: それもいいかな　テンション下がっちゃうから
125.letter: Let's not do that either, it'll bring the mood down.

126.speaker: PENGUIN
126.character: しろくま君　しゃべろう

127.speaker: POLAR BEAR
127.character: ペンギンさんのダメなところは　お金にだらしないところ
127.letter: Mr. Penguin's bad trait is that he's bad with money.

129.speaker: POLAR BEAR
129.character: はい！次回しろくまカフェ最終回　お楽しみに
129.letter: Okay. Next time on "Polar Bear's Café," the last episode.  Enjoy!

130.speaker: PENGUIN
130.character: 終わらせないよ　しろくまカフェ第二話　お楽しみに
130.letter: I'm not letting you end with that! "Polar Bear's Café" episode two! Enjoy!
